name: Ace Legends
description:
The year is 1918 and it is time to get your wings in this action-packed World War One aerial shooter. 

Fight off waves of realistic enemy formations as you witness the Great War raging below you. Watch warplanes as they take a hit, go into a dive, or spin in loops and then crash with a thud. Look with awe as a tank then finishes the job while keeping an eye on the sky for your next victim! 

Ace Manfred von Richthofen was credited with the most kills during World War I and nicknamed the "Red Baron" due to the color of his flamboyant aircraft. Relive the infancy of aerial combat and become the heroic German pilot in this addictive top-down First World War shooter.

Become a Legend...

Become the Ace Red Baron!
